name: What Happened (ScallyGames, JustALittleCreature, yorschor)
description:
You spectate the state of a world some time after it's beginning. Try to find out what happened and which actions caused it to be in this state. Then try to backtrack these steps and get back to the earliest point in the world's existence.

Controls:
Click arrows to undo movements

Goal:

Get to the start tile
